name: Kettlebell Lunge
description: Hold one or two kettlebells at your sides (suitcase style) or in the rack position. Step forward into a lunge, lowering until both knees are at approximately 90 degrees. Drive through the front heel to return to standing. Alternate legs or complete all reps on one side. Rack position adds a core stability challenge.

media.caption: 4 Kettlebell Lunge Variations for Athletic Performance
The Only Kettlebell Workout You Need (Reverse Lunge)
